tool_description: Transfer news for football - I am not currently developing this api further.
name: Football Transfer News
title: Football Transfer News

api_list.name: transfer-news/club/{clubName}
api_list.description: gets news for a specific team so for instance if you want 'liverpool' use 'transfer-news/club/liverpool'

api_list.name: /{language}/transfer-news
api_list.description: Allows users to request articles in specific languages (english, german, italian, spanish, french) this is a work in progress at the moment only english/spanish are avaliable

api_list.name: transfer-news/{sourceId}
api_list.description: Transfer news from a specific source

api_list.name: transfer-news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com/transfer-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com/transfer-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-transfer-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
